job_description: As a Supply Chain professional at Performance Improvement (PI), you will be working with many of the world’s leading organizations improving their Supply Chain performance in a rapidly changing environment. You will be part of multidisciplinary teams, bringing diverse perspectives to every challenge. Our team will help you achieve your potential by supporting your professional development and giving you experience with a diverse range of clients and projects.Responsibilities:Work closely across industries with client business teamReview and evaluate current state of Supply Chain and Operations by using a robust set of data analytics and assessment toolsIdentify gaps in client operations and recommend resolutions for further improvementsDesign deliverables content to reflect client needs and strive to develop deliverable quality through verification and validation of resultsManage engagement to ensure the project is on track and all milestones are met under supervision from project manager, and report to client’s top managementConduct market research, feasibility study, and business developmentSupport project manager/ team leader in executing projects and other tasksQualifications:Bachelor of Engineering (Industrial, Mechanical, or Production), BBA, or Supply Chain relatedPreferably Master degree (MBA, Supply Chain Management, and etc.)0-6 years of professional experience with at least one of the following areas: Sales and Operations Planning, Procurement, Manufacturing, or Distribution and LogisticsPreferably consulting professional experience either through internship or past professional backgroundHardworking, self-motivated individual, and team player with excellent interpersonal skillsStrong analytical, problem solving, and managerial skillsAble to work under pressure, aggressive timeframe, and consulting lifestyleVery good Thai and English communication skillsPreferably Lean Operations experience, Six Sigma educated, and/or TPS practicedEquipped with MS office, and capable of analysis applications is advantageousPreferably experience in VBAAbility to travel to upcountry or abroad is requiredIf you are looking for a challenging job with dynamic fast-paced environment, we invite you joining our hands and building a better working world!

Minimize errors in picking and data entry system.Ensure the products are stored according to their required storage temperature.Manage temperature monitoring and recording as schedule.Manage and record housekeeping and Pest Control as plan.Manage Shelf Life Control as per FEFO and maintain product trace-ability in system.Ensure product segregation within all warehouse storage area is in place by product batch, expiry and status.Ensure minimized damage, extra cost and human error.Ensure standard of storage is optimized in compliance with specified SOPS.Ensure all reports and urgent requirements are done in timely manner.Schedule weekly cycle count and submit the report.Feedback upon the request of any other parties in a timely manner.Ensure warehouse inside and compound are kept cleaned all the time.Identify root causes and perform corrective actions and preventive actions on internal and external audit findings.Cooperate with M&E to ensure all equipment and machines are standing by to operate.Back up of DC Head when DC Head is not available. Follow company's rules & regulations.Perform any other tasks as assigned by DC Head.THE CANDIDATE:Any Graduate.Minimum consecutive 5 years working experience in warehousing or Logistic.At least three years working experience in managerial role.Good Communication Skills.Good in English Proficiency (4 skills).Managerial Skill & Analytical Skill.Good in Computer Skills (Microsoft Office) - essential.The company offers a competitive package, reflecting the Candidate’s level of experience, performance expectations and qualifications. job_title: หัวหน้าคลังสินค้า (Supervisor level) / บางนา
job_description: รายละเอียดงานควบคุมกระบวนการหมุนเวียนสินค้าภายในคลัง ผ่านระบบควบคุมดูแลพนักงานประจำคลังสินค้า ในการจัดเตรียมสินค้าเพื่อเติมในเครื่องจำหน่ายสินค้าประจำวันควบคุมดูแลคนขับรถเติมสินค้า ในการกระจ่ายสินค้าไปยังเครื่องจำหน่ายสินค้าตามเส้นทางที่จัดไว้จัดทำรายงานเกี่ยวกับสินค้าเข้า-สินค้าออกในแต่ละวันตรวจสอบสินค้าคงเหลือภายในคลังให้ถูกต้องตามจำนวน พร้อมทั้งแจ้งรายงานความผิดปกติหรือปัญหาที่พบเพื่อนำมาปรับปรุงแก้ไขกระบวนการและระบบต่อไปเป็นผู้รับผิดชอบหลักในการพัฒนาคลัง ทั้งในส่วนของบุคคลากรและส่วนพื้นที่คลังสินค้าให้อยู่ในความเรียบร้อยควบคุมระเบียบการเข้าออก-งาน รวมถึงการลางานเพื่อไม่ให้เกิดผลกระทบต่อการทำงานวางแผนการทำงานให้เป็นไปตามนโยบายและเป้าหมายองค์กร ชี้แจงนโยบายบริษัทและแนวทางการปฏิบัติงานของพนักงาน และหน้าที่รับผิดชอบอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากหัวหน้าคุณสมบัติผู้สมัครเพศชาย อายุไม่เกิน 40 ปี จบการศึกษาปริญญาตรี สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีทักษะการวางแผนที่ดี สามารถแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้มีประสบการณ์ในการทำงานด้านคลังสินค้า / การขนส่งสินค้า/ ดูสต็อกสินค้าปรับตัวในการทำงานให้เข้ากับสถานการณ์ พิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ หากสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ วิธีการสมัครสามารถ Walk-In เข้ามาสมัครได้ด้วยตนเองที่ ตึก Empire tower, BTS ช่องนนทรี ทางออกที่ 5, เปิดรับสมัครทุกวันจันทร์ ถึง ศุกร์ เวลา 9:00 - 17:00, ติดต่อสอบถามเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ฝ่ายบุุคคล 02-6700268

job_qualifications: ['s :Thai Nationality only.High Vocational degree or higher in any fields.Ability to communicate with people at all levels within the organization.Good command for using computer (Microsoft Excel, Word, Power Point, Adobe Acrobat).Good problem solving skills and ability to assess what actions are required for admin tasksAble to work under pressure, service-mind and hard working.Responsibilities :Coordinating MaterialsMaterial Controllers coordinate and expedite movement of materials between departments according to each department’s production and shipping requirements. They also create and maintain computerized records of these movements.Order Management Computation of the amounts of material or items required to complete specific job orders is a responsibility of Material Controllers. They must have knowledge of product manufacturing and related processes to successfully estimate how much each department or job requires.Inventory Control Knowing how to create, compile and maintain manual or computerized records is an essential job duty of Material Controllers. They need these records to be able to verify inventory numbers and locations and to have available in the instance of an audit. Various software programs can be utilized to help with inventory control.Transporting Materials Material Controllers often have to move or transport materials between departments in response to production needs. Knowledge of equipment such as forklifts or pallet jacks is helpful. In addition, knowing how to move items safely without bodily injury to themselves or others is essential.Examining and Verifying Materials Upon receiving new inventory, Material Controllers are tasked with examining the materials to verify that they conform to production specifications. They must be familiar with these specifications or have the ability to look in the reference manuals for the information. They must document any exceptions and arrange for the return or exchange of any materials that fail to meet specifications.Only short listed candidates will be contacted.Interested candidates, please submit your resume and recent photograph via Apply NowSamsung Engineering (Thailand) Co., Ltd.No. 1 Empire Tower Building, 37th floor, South Sathorn Road,Yannawa, Sathorn, Bangkok, 10120  ']
job_description: Qualifications :Thai Nationality only.High Vocational degree or higher in any fields.Ability to communicate with people at all levels within the organization.Good command for using computer (Microsoft Excel, Word, Power Point, Adobe Acrobat).Good problem solving skills and ability to assess what actions are required for admin tasksAble to work under pressure, service-mind and hard working.Responsibilities :Coordinating MaterialsMaterial Controllers coordinate and expedite movement of materials between departments according to each department’s production and shipping requirements. They also create and maintain computerized records of these movements.Order Management Computation of the amounts of material or items required to complete specific job orders is a responsibility of Material Controllers. They must have knowledge of product manufacturing and related processes to successfully estimate how much each department or job requires.Inventory Control Knowing how to create, compile and maintain manual or computerized records is an essential job duty of Material Controllers. They need these records to be able to verify inventory numbers and locations and to have available in the instance of an audit. Various software programs can be utilized to help with inventory control.Transporting Materials Material Controllers often have to move or transport materials between departments in response to production needs. Knowledge of equipment such as forklifts or pallet jacks is helpful. In addition, knowing how to move items safely without bodily injury to themselves or others is essential.Examining and Verifying Materials Upon receiving new inventory, Material Controllers are tasked with examining the materials to verify that they conform to production specifications. They must be familiar with these specifications or have the ability to look in the reference manuals for the information. They must document any exceptions and arrange for the return or exchange of any materials that fail to meet specifications.Only short listed candidates will be contacted.Interested candidates, please submit your resume and recent photograph via Apply NowSamsung Engineering (Thailand) Co., Ltd.No. 1 Empire Tower Building, 37th floor, South Sathorn Road,Yannawa, Sathorn, Bangkok, 10120

job_title: Assistant Manager - Customer Service and Logistics (MT/TT)
job_responsibilities: ['Position:Assistant Manager - Customer Service and Logistics (MT/TT)Clients:Modern Trade & Traditional TradeLocation: Klongtoey, Bangkok, Thailand**Office is not connected to BTS/MRT**Job summary:The Customer Services/ Logistics Assistant Manager links the Supply Chain to Customer Development and is responsible for ensuring that the Supply Chain is aligned both internally within Colgate and externally with customer/middlemen expectations. Provides a critical link between Demand Planning and Sales Planning to ensure alignment. Contributes to the ongoing development of best practices across the Supply Chain and Customer Development organizations and ensures that reciprocal Supply Chain initiatives are agreed, developed and executed with excellenceCore ResponsibilitiesWorks with the order fulfillment process (order to delivery) in order to ensure delivery of goods to customers. Additionally, this will necessitate driving prompt process issue resolution to ensure joint goals are achieved. Monitors performance metrics Key Performance Indicators (KPI’s) to understand service and efficiency trends within assigned customers and find opportunities for improvement. Shares performance information with the Team and customers to develop collaborative approaches to correct inefficient behaviors or fix system disconnects.Coordinates cross-functional work teams to eliminate root causes of customer supply chain inefficiency and Out of Stocks (OOS) – by evaluating Customer POS data. Effective communications skills are critical to ensure that the entire Customer Development Team and our customers are kept informed of all issues.Has deep understanding of customer/middlemen supply chain strategies and collaboratively develops joint solutions to reduce waste and complexity and grow sales. Adopts an ‘end-to-end’ view of supply chain inventory levels to enrich demand planning performance, remove waste and grow on-shelf availability.Leads implementation of value added services such as CPFR, VMI, EDI etc.Actively participates in ‘Demand Planning’ both internal and with the customers (merchandising and replenishment departments) to ensure execution of plan by customer and fulfillment of plan by Colgate-Palmolive at the lowest total delivered cost. Special emphasis must be given to new product introductions and promotional activities.Works closely with the Customer Development Team Finance Services Manager to optimize a “Cost to Serve” model and customer Economic Order Quantities (EOQ).Establishes relationships at multiple levels within the customers’ organizations. Works with customers in an advisory/expert capacity on supply chain initiatives driven by Supplier Collaboration Boards and internal Colgate initiatives.Understanding key issues customers face and the implications for the Supply Chain and able to actively communicate with customers when supply execution issues are experienced to manage customer expectations Seeks opportunities to drive Supply Chain efficiency by managing sku’s and driving rationalization/harmonization initiatives. Enforces Customer Development Policies as they pertain to the Supply Chain (i.e. returns) ']

This position is perfect for a professional in the automotive industry, having prior experience with Pre-Delivery Inspection process, as well as Body and Paint Quality checks. Besides the technical aspect, the adequate candidate will have experience, interacting and managing with different stakeholders, such as Third-Parties, the customer, and internal stakeholders. In this role, you would be responsible for the following.Scope of workManages the overall processes of functional and visual inspection of the vehicles before delivery to ensure it meets the customers expectation.Understand customer requirements concerning vehicles condition prior to shipmentEvaluate daily production requirements and ensure the appropriate scheduling of resources.Manages KNT personnel and responsible of Overall performance of the Pre-Delivery Inspection unit.Ensure all associates are following all environment laws regarding VOCs and overall safety regulations and maintain a clean, orderly and safe work environmentManages activities together with the 3rd Party.Liaises with the Workshop/ Paintshop unit in case of defect, and ensures defects are accordingly handled, in accordance to the Customer Requirements.Ensure that operating procedures and activities are in line with customer requirements and communicate on continuous improvement to meet customer expectations.Identify and implement cost reduction activities where possible.Organizes and meets different stakeholders on weekly, monthly quarterly basis, presenting results, improvements that have been implemented by the teams. Meet with Workshop/Parts Manager to plan the shift and discuss other issues that arise.Ensure that established operating procedures are followed for all department functions and processes.Respond to customers’ requests in a timely manner while ensuring quality services.Ensure all repairs are performed as per supplier’s specifications for quality and warranty compliance.Communicate with in house and outside Surveyors to ensure proper damages and source are recorded.Review completed repairs for quality.Manage PDI work space accordingly and ensure all areas stay productive.What we are looking for in a successful candidateMinimum bachelor’s degree in a business-related discipline or by experiencePrior experience in the same type of function, within the automotive industryA thorough understanding of Automotive processes and requirements in terms of Quality and Inspection of Finished vehiclesExperience in managing relations with different internal and external stakeholdersStrong computer skills – Microsoft OfficeStrong Presentation skillsExcellent organizational and leadership skillsGood analytical/critical thinkingStrong problem solving and follow up skillsFluent in English communication, reading and writingAn attractive salary and generous fringe benefits will be offered to the successful candidates as well as further Career Evolution.Interested candidates please send your application letter with resume, current and expected salary with contact details and referring to the positionFeel free to visit our YouTube channel and find more information about Katoen Natie:Enter into the World of Katoen Natie

job_title: General and Operations Manager (Manufacturing), Chonburi, Thailand
job_description: Salary: AttractiveAdditional Benefits:AttractiveCompany profileExecutive recruitment company Monroe Consulting Group is recruiting on behalf of a well-established manufacturing company. Our respected client is seeking a well-rounded finance and business leader for the job of General and Operations Manager. The job is based in Chonburi, Thailand.Job SummaryThe General and Operations Manager will be responsible for the overall well-being of the company's operations. Mainly taking care of finance and accounting with supervision of small teams of administrators and supply chain. They will work closely with the head quarter with expectation to build a strong relationship and better working procedure internally, managing and ensuring all commercial activities are carried out in accordance with the relevant policies and procedures.Job responsibilitiesAct as an Operations Manager serves as a financial and accounting manager and a leader to supply chain and administration departmentsPlan and manage companies’ yearly budget, perform monthly budget review actual vs. forecast, forecasting, controlling, cash flow, P&L, financial statement, and reports Take care of matters related to credit control, and AR collectionDevelop and implement procedures for contract management and administration in compliance with company policyAs appropriate, contribute to or influence company policiesCoordinate with different departments for the financial and commercial reporting function in a timely and accurate mannerUndertake the day to day administration of the company; including company secretarial, financial reporting, procurement, accounting and general administration through liaison with bookkeepers, lead accountants, directors and other support teams associated with full client service provisionMaintain contractual records and documentation such as receipt and control of all contract correspondence, customer contact information sheets, contractual changes, status reports and other documents for all projects Develop and implement the sourcing and procurement standard evaluation systemProvide Evaluation, Risk Identification, Negotiation, and Execution of contractsSupervise all procurement processes, quoting, negotiating, supplier nominating, issuing purchase orders and reporting, and ensure on time and quality delivery for services or products purchased Adhere to group policy on complaints, internal procedures and encourage others to do the sameWrite and submit reports to the Director in all matters of importance, and on all management’s group reporting documents for the companyMonitor compliance by company employees with established proceduresIdentify areas of recurrent pressureDeal with queries from internal auditors on internal controls and providing back up where neededActing as mentor to any team members requiring general support and guidanceUndertake and contribute towards objective setting and regular performance appraisals, including giving, receiving, and acting upon feedback on individuals and team performance Job requirementsMinimum of 7 years' business and finance controlling experienceExperience managing high-level professionals in manufacturing industryExperience working with multi-national firms and familiar with newly set up plantDemonstrate management skillsProficient in Microsoft Office applications, such as Excel, PowerPoint, and WordStrong quantitative abilities and excellent written and oral communication skillsStrong proficiency in Traditional Chinese and Thai will be advantageStrategic and analytical thinkers who are driven by results and can innovate and develop creative business and financial solutionsINTERESTED?All applications will be treated in the strictest confidence. If you are a suitable match for this position please simply click theAPPLYbutton below and please ensurethat your CV is a WORD document and not a PDF

job_title: Project Supervisor (คลังสินค้า) ประจำ หาดใหญ่
job_description: Project Supervisor (คลังสินค้า)สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน อ.หาดใหญ่ จ.สงขลาหน้าที่รับผิดชอบรับนโยบายคุณภาพและเป้าหมาย และนำไปบริหารและจัดการทีมให้ดำเนินการไปตามนโยบาย แผนงาน และเป้าหมายที่กำหนดไว้ปรับปรุงและพัฒนาระบบงานคลังสินค้าให้เกิดประสิทธิภาพสูงสุดวางแผนและจัดสรรกำลังคนให้มีตามเหมาะสมและมีประสิทธิภาพอยู่ตลอดเวลาบริหารและจัดการทีมงานให้เป็นไปตามกฎระเบียบข้อกำหนดและนโยบายความปลอดภัย อาชีวอนามัยและสิ่งแวดล้อม รวมทั้งดูแลพนักงานให้ปฏิบัติตามขั้นตอนและหลักการปฏิบัติงานอย่างเคร่งครัดคุณสมบัติวุฒิปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป ในสาขาอื่นทีเกี่ยวข้องอายุไม่เกิน 35 ปีมีประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 3 ปีขึ้นไปด้านงานคลังสินค้าหรืองานที่เกี่ยวข้องในระดับหัวหน้างานสามารถแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี และสามารถทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้มีความรู้ประสบการณ์และแนวคิดเกี่ยวกับความปลอดภัยในการทำงานมีภาวะผู้นำ สามารถดูแลและควบคุมการทำงานของทีมให้เป็นไปตามเป้าหมายที่วางไว้หากสนใจสมัครงานสามารถสมัครผ่านช่องทาง JobDB หรือติดต่อสอบถามเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ :086-4608602

You will be responsible for the effective management & controlling of all facets of the Demand, Supply, Inventory Planning, Purchasing, Operations and Logistics. This is a strategic position and you are expected to be able to deliver effective & efficient services which are timely, cost effective and business compliant.Client DetailsOur Client is a leading FMCG company with a significant market share in key global markets, offering a variety of innovative products to their customers. The company has a vision to combine innovation, knowledge, people and products. With increasing demand and new product introductions, they are currently looking for a Supply Chain Manager to be an integral part of their SEA business to assist and continue their current growth spurt.DescriptionDevelop, implement and execute strategies covering all spectrum of Supply Chain processes including supplier/production/demand planning, distribution, logistics and operations for the regionEstablishing the Sales, Inventory and Operations Planning (S&OP) processesTo set direction, strategies, vision with a keen focus on driving continuous improvement activities within the Supply Chain funciton in order to develop successful performance platformsMarket analysis to identify strengths vs weaknessesEnsure effective relationships with peer groups and external partners such as 3PLEvaluate, define and strategise Distribution & Operations processes across the regionSpearheading Cost savings Projects for the region - structural changes, longer-term vs strategic movesCapital Expenditure: Prepare and agree annual and longer-term capital budgets and take responsibility for implementation of approved projects for the manufacturing sitesProfileBachelors or Masters degree in Supply Chain Management, Business or other related disciplinesAt least 10 years of experience in Supply Chain, ideally with experience in the FMCG/food & beverage/agriculture/feed/pharmaceutical industriesOutstanding leadership capabilities, ability to communicate a compelling vision for the supply management organisation, and ability to drive results while developing a strong teamExcellent English language skills (both verbal and written)Ability to work in a fast pace, results-oriented environment under minimal supervisionJob OfferSenior leadership opportunity in a quickly growing, global organisationExcellent compensation and benefits schemeTo apply online please click the "Apply" button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Sonia Fernandez on +66 2 012 5017

job_responsibilities: ['Job description Transportation Manager:*** "Chinese or English Speaking" ***1. Responsible for the evaluation and planning of the new distribution center site;2. หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบขับรถส่วนกลางคุณสมบัติของผู้สมัคร เพศชาย สัญชาติไทยอายุ 25 ปีขึ้นไปไม่จำกัดวุฒิการศึกษามีประสบการณ์ทำงานเป็นคนขับรถส่วนกลาง ขับรถผู้บริหารชาวต่างชาติสามารถขับรถยนต์ไปต่างจังหวัดได้สามารถทำงานล่วงเวลาได้บริษัท ซัมซุง เอ็นจิเนียริ่ง (ประเทศไทย) จำกัดเลขที่ 1 อาคารเอ็มไพร์ ทาวเวอร์ ชั้น 37ถนนสาทรใต้ แขวงยานนาวา เขตสาทรกรุงเทพมหานคร 10120
คุณสมบัติที่ต้องการจัดหาสินค้า ติดต่อซับพลายเออร์ เปรียบเทียบราคาประสานงานกับส่วนงานต่างๆตรวจสอบสินค้าแพ็คสินค้าจัดเตรียมเพื่อขนส่งสามาถทำงาน 6 วัน/สัปดาห์ได้สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : พัฒนาการ 33/35

หน้าที่เคลื่อนย้ายสินค้า หรือแพ็คสินค้าส่งออกเช็คสต๊อคสินค้า จัดสินค้าตามออเดอร์ลูกค้าจัดเก็บสินค้าให้ตรงตามสต๊อคปฏิบัติงานอื่น ๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติไม่จำกัดวุฒิการศึกษาไม่ต้องมีประสบการณ์ มีทีมงานสอนงานให้เพศชาย หญิง อายุ18ปี ขึ้นไปมีความรับผิดขอบสูงและสามารถปรับตัวเข้ากับการทำงานได้ดีร่างกายแข็งแรง สามารถยกของหนักได้สามารถทำงานเป็นกะได้สวัสดิการค่าแรง360 บาท ต่อวัน (ทำงาน6 วัน แบบเข้ากะ)เบี้ยขยัน2,500 บาท ต่อ เดือนโอที วันละ3ชั่วโมง (67.50 บาท ต่อชั่วโมง)เงินเดือนออกทุกสิ้นเดือนอาหารฟรี1 มื้อ (กาแฟ โอวัลติน ฟรี)เงินเลิกล่วงหน้า2,000บาท ต่อเดือน (ทุกวันที่15ของทุกเดือน)ประกันสัมคม และ อื่น ๆเอกสารในการสมัตรงานสำเนาบัตรประจำตัวประชาชนสำเนาทะเบียนบ้านสำเนาหน้าแรกสมุดบัญชีธนาคารกรุงเทพ(สามารถกรอกประวัติส่วนตัวที่บริษัทได้)สนใจติดต่อบริษัท ชิลินโด จำกัด242 / 9หมู่6 ต. บางเพรียง อ. บางบ่อ จ. สมุทรปราการ10560เบอร์ติดต่อโทรคุณตาล061 864 7373คุณลูกแก้ว093 139 8696

job_description: หนา้ที่และความรับผิดชอบ (Duties and Responsibility)ควบคุมดูแลงบประมาณของฝ่าย/เงินสดย่อยการควบคุมดูแลงานของ Outsource ทำความสะอาดดูแลและประสานงานซ่อมบำรุง อาคารสถานที่ อุปกรณ์ เครื่องมือจัดหาอุปกรณ์เครื่องมือเครื่องใช้ ตามที่ร้องขอและstock อุปโภค บริโภคติดตามแผนและ KPI ของฝ่ายตามกำหนดประสานงานการจ่ายค่าจ้างพนง.รายวัน และการเบิกจ่าย งานเอกสาร สัญญา รายงาน / อื่นๆคุณสมบัติตำแหน่ง (Qualifications)เพศ ชาย/หญิงอำยุ 25-35 ปีวุฒิการศึกษา ปริญญาตรี สาขาโลจิสติกส์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องประสบการณ์ 2 ปีขึ้นไป ด้าน ดูแลธุรการคลังสินค้าความสามารถ ใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office ได้ โดยเฉพาะ Power point ได้เป็นอย่างดีเงินเดือน: 15,000 บาท (สามารถต่อรองได้)สวัสดิการทำงานสัปดาห์ละ 5 วันสิทธิการเบิกค่าทันตกรรมประกันชีวิตประกันสุขภาพ

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:Performing and implementing all custom clearance activities such as following upcoming shipment, documents transactions and day-to-day related activities in accordance with the objectives, policies and procedures.Participating in implementing the anticipated plans and programs as per the set goals to ensure internal work development and productivity increase.Participating in the development of the Customs Clearance Section's work plan and preparing work schedules and expediting workflow to improve the efficiency of the Customs Clearance Section.Suggesting plans and programs that strive to improve the effectiveness of the Customs Clearance Section.Following up with the operation department and clients for the reception of the complete set of shipping documents for customs clearance purposes, and ensure its compliance with Thailand Customs regulations and exemption lists requirements.Following up with the freight forwarders, couriers and shipping lines for freight quotations and price lists for inbound and outbound shipments.Following up shipments and documents with the freight forwarders and shipping lines.Following up with the transporter(s) to ensure on-time & complete delivery of cleared shipments.Keeping records of all demurrages, detentions, etc. and follow up with the concerned buyers for settlements and implements preventive actions to avoid customs penalties.Examining invoices and shipping manifests for conformity to tariff and customs regulations.Preparing periodic reports with respect to Customs Clearance Section's activities and achievements.Having a complete knowledge to prepare and confirmed all import permits from the Ministry of Internal Affairs and General Safety and Security and all import custom exemption documents, formats and formalities.Verifying the delivery of the imported product, once cleared, from the sea to our designated warehouses.Performing other duties related to the job as assigned by VP.Job Requirements:Previous experience is required at least 5-8 years in the same position.Extensive knowledge of import procedures.Proficient in the use of Microsoft Office.Exceptional organizational and time management skills with high attention to detail.Ability to work independently and multi-task in a high-volume, fast-paced environment.Excellent communication skills.Good presentation skills.Problem-solving skills.

A global leading logistics company is looking for an Operations Manager (x1 vacancy) to be based in Rayong to support the expanding of the business for all operations processes. About the Operations Manager Role:Reporting to Site Manager, you will be responsible for all operations processes. You will have the opportunity to lead operations activities in various categories. You can enjoy benefits such as medical allowance and provident fund for this role.Key Responsibilities:To achieve operation plan under responsible business unitResponsible to manage team to achieve KPI targetsReview and manage DC operationsBe representative to clients for general operations and troubleshooting issuesThe successful Operations Manager will possess at least five to eight years' experience in operations management in a logistics environment.  Key Requirements:Bachelor Degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management or related fieldExperience in FMCG or F&B business is a plusAbility to communicate well at all level with leadership characteristicCan work well under pressure with tight deadlineThis organisation is still growing rapidly and has become one of the preferred suppliers in the industry. If you are a dynamic and proactive person, this organisation welcomes you and your ideas. If you are a talented and focused currently seeking the right opportunity to take your career forward, this Operations Manager job is the role for you. You will be a part of a forward-thinking company that values innovation and progressive mindset.Apply today or call me to discuss this new opportunity.Robert Walters Recruitment (Thailand) LimitedRecruitment License No.: น. 1188 / 2551

job_description: Job Description- Complete the sales targets set by the company and carry out sales work in this industry in a planned manner- Develop new customers, establish perfect customer information, and complete relevant sales reports- Maintain good relationship with the existing customers and promote long-term and stable cooperative relations between customers and the company- Responsible for the customer's accounts receivable recovery in accordance to the time period of collection set by the company- Participate in sales meetings or organized training of company- Pay visit to the customer regularly, collect customer feedback, complaints and other information, and forward it to relevant departments in order to improve service quality- Establish a good relationship with customers to maintain corporate imageJob Requirement- University degree or above, preferably shipping or international trade related majors- Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English (proficiency in Mandarin will be added as advantage)- Able to withstand pressure and work in a team- Hard working and with strong communication skills, ability to cope with challenges- Priority will be given to those with sales experience or experience in ocean freight and air freight

ควบคุมการบริหารงานของส่วนงาน Transportation ทั้งหมดประเมินผลงาน การทำงานประจำปี ของส่วนงาน Transportation ทั้งหมดจัดทำรายงาน และติดตามผลการทำงานของทีม เพื่อรายงานต่อผู้บังคับบัญชาพิจารณา และอนุมัติการลา/ ขาด/มาสายของส่วนงาน Transportation ทั้งหมดวางแผนเข้าพบลูกค้าประจำปี เพื่อสร้างสัมพันธ์ที่ดีให้กับบริษัทและลูกค้าเป็นตัวแทนเข้าร่วมประชุม และทำกิจกรรมต่างๆทั้งส่วนงานภายใน และภายนอกบริษัทวางแผนกำลังพลของส่วนงาน Transportation ให้เหมาะสมกับปริมาณงานศึกษา วิเคราะห์ นำเสนอโครงการต่างๆเพื่อนำเสนอผู้บังคับรับผิดชอบและดูแลงานที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บังคับบัญชา เช่น โครงการต่างๆในอนาคตคุณสมบัติ :วุฒิการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี ด้านโลจิสติกส์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องประสบการณ์ในงานด้านขนส่งในธุรกิจ FMCG ไม่น้อยกว่า 3 ปีมีความรู้ทางด้านกฎหมาย ข้อกำหนดของการขนส่งสามารถใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ได้ดี (Ms.Office และ SAP)

job_responsibilities: ["Job descriptionThe Customer Service and Logistics Coordinator is execute customer service support and outbound logistics for Asia/Pacific to achieve customer satisfaction through supply chain projects to optimize logistics cost. Prime role and responsibilities shall include: Customer ServiceExecute order entry and order confirmation within timeline.Support O2C team whenever required.Generate relevant shipping documents correctly.Deal with customer’s claims in timely response.Provide alternatives source for product availability when customer request.Clear financial related issues – Credit/Debit note issuance, follow up payments.LogisticsWork closely with local order management team on shipping arrangement.Advise customer service in Europe and Americas of international drop shipments when necessary.Checking of shipping documents.Supply Chain and Commercial SupportsSupport Sales – forecast vs orders and ad-hoc customers’ requests.Coordinate with commercial team relating to customer visits to the site when necessary.Back up team members in Europe and Americas for continuous service when necessary.Define and improve the SOP's relating to customer service."]
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor Degree in in Business/Science/Logistics/ Supply Chain Management or related field.Have knowledge in Logistics and Customer Service, ERP Systems and quality systems e.g. ISO9001, ISO14001, ISO45001, GMP for food contact material.Preferable knowledge of Sales & Operations Planning.Minimum 3 years relevant experience in customer service and logistics management.Experience in working with customers in B to B environment.Good skills of MS Office e.g. MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint.Have skills of AS400, BPCS and ERP System is advantage.Fluent written and spoken English (directly report to Expat Boss and need to coordinate with Global team).***Able to work in Asia Industrial Estate, Ban Chang, Rayong*** ']
job_description: Job descriptionThe Customer Service and Logistics Coordinator is execute customer service support and outbound logistics for Asia/Pacific to achieve customer satisfaction through supply chain projects to optimize logistics cost. Prime role and responsibilities shall include: Customer ServiceExecute order entry and order confirmation within timeline.Support O2C team whenever required.Generate relevant shipping documents correctly.Deal with customer’s claims in timely response.Provide alternatives source for product availability when customer request.Clear financial related issues – Credit/Debit note issuance, follow up payments.LogisticsWork closely with local order management team on shipping arrangement.Advise customer service in Europe and Americas of international drop shipments when necessary.Checking of shipping documents.Supply Chain and Commercial SupportsSupport Sales – forecast vs orders and ad-hoc customers’ requests.Coordinate with commercial team relating to customer visits to the site when necessary.Back up team members in Europe and Americas for continuous service when necessary.Define and improve the SOP's relating to customer service.Qualifications:Bachelor Degree in in Business/Science/Logistics/ Supply Chain Management or related field.Have knowledge in Logistics and Customer Service, ERP Systems and quality systems e.g. ISO9001, ISO14001, ISO45001, GMP for food contact material.Preferable knowledge of Sales & Operations Planning.Minimum 3 years relevant experience in customer service and logistics management.Experience in working with customers in B to B environment.Good skills of MS Office e.g. MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint.Have skills of AS400, BPCS and ERP System is advantage.Fluent written and spoken English (directly report to Expat Boss and need to coordinate with Global team).***Able to work in Asia Industrial Estate, Ban Chang, Rayong***

ความรับผิดชอบบริหารจัดการข้อมูลต่างๆ ที่เกิดขึ้นภายในระบบประสานงานกับฝ่ายต่างๆ เพื่อแก้ไขปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้นติดต่อประสานงานกับลูกค้า เพื่อจัดการปัญหาหรือข้อร้องเรียนจากลูกค้าประสานงานกับคู่ค้าหรือบุคคลภายนอก เพื่อให้การทำงานสำเร็จลุล่วงงานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป ไม่จำกัดสาขา หากมีประสบการณ์ด้าน Express/Logistics จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ (ยินดีพิจารณานักศึกษาจบใหม่)สามารถใช้งานคอมพิวเตอร์และโปรแกรมขั้นพื้นฐาน เช่น Microsoft Excel และ PowerPoint ได้มีความขยัน อดทน รอบคอบ และมีความรับผิดชอบต่องานที่ได้รับมอบหมายมีทักษะในการบริหารจัดการ และสามารถเจรจาต่อรองได้ดีสามารถทำงาน 6 วัน วันจันทร์-เสาร์ได้สามารถยืดหยุ่นเวลาการทำงานได้

job_responsibilities: ['Pomelois leading online fashion company in Emerging Asia. Backed by fashion and technology investors from across the world, Pomelo brings its unique fast fashion style to Emerging Asia through a technology-driven, vertically-integrated design, and production model. Our growth strategy is to merge our online focus of mobile and social with the latest trends and data.Job DescriptionWe are looking for a LogisticsSeniorAssociate who wants to understand how an ecommerce fashion brand works and creates a digital experience for its customers. Are you the kind of person who enjoys overseeing logistics processes? Proficient in data analysis and Excel? We are looking for a talent to join our team.You will work closely in Logistics team to coordinate & monitor daily logistics operations regionally. At Pomelo, each team member is expected to work autonomously, often setting their own objectives and key results.ResponsibilitiesOverseeing the shipping statuses of domestic delivery shipment and 3PL relationship management with all logistics partners.Assist to manage all logistics project management regarding to assignments.Ensure the daily packages handover from TH Pomelo warehouse to domestic logistics partners are done completely,accurately and smoothly .Monitoring daily 3PL performance and backlog. Also to ensure delivery statuses are sync to Pomelo system.Monitoring return order and coordinating with TH warehouse and 3PL(s) on returns process and status update to ensure no long pending returnsExperience in B2B and B2C in cross border and domestic delivery,market benchmark and negotiationIdentify logistics operations root cause both Pomelo operations and 3PL operations. Quick solution to solve problem. Implement projects and solutions according to assignments.Preparing & maintaining alllogistics internal & external reports. Also 3PLs invoices, Duty and Tax invoice validationBe the contact point for CS and WH for any day-to-day operational enquiries and issues related to shipments.Proficiently using Pomelo system in investigating any abnormality of shipments.Coordinating with 3PL to make necessary arrangements for additional package pickups from Pomelo Base.Collaborate with other regional Logistics team members in shipments follow-up and investigations.Administer and monitor 3PL claims in cases of damage or loss. ']

The Regional Supply Chain Manager will responsible for leading a team of 6 people located in the major ASEAN countries. You will be reporting to APAC Senior Supply Chain Manager. Client DetailsOur client is a leading American agricultural chemical and seed company. Their company is over 200 years old and focusing on seed solutions, crop protection and digital agriculture. They are the world's only major Agri science company completed dedicated to agriculture. You will work alongside with employees around the world to conduct business in a responsible and future-oriented manner for the benefit of our customers and shareholders as wellbeing. DescriptionAs a Regional Supply Chain Manager, you are responsible forCommunicating product allocation to the CU leadership team and trade-offs to the businessCollecting current sales demand and reconcile with available finished goods inventoryEnsuring proper distribution of inventory in the different channelsEnsuring SC is aligned with other SPSC regional functions within their CUCross-functional link with Commercial and R&DProactively involved in IBP process at CU levelCommunicating to Demand Manager potential risks for WD and discards in the countries  ProfileIn order to be considered, you must have:Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain or related fieldOver 7 years in supply chain role with management skillsSupply Chain Accreditation preferred (ex. APICS CSCP or similar)Team players and "can-do" attitudeIntermediate to advanced Microsoft Excel skillsGood Attitude and Interpersonal skillGood command in spoken & written English  Job OfferVery attractive salaryChance to work and learn from one of the most leading successful global companyAble to prioritize both your personal and professional development  To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Chavit Sukseree on +662 012 5055

job_title: Regional Supply Chain Manager - Chemical MNC
job_description: The Regional Supply Chain Manager will responsible for leading a team in SEA as team leader. You will deal with leaders with different functions to create business success. Client DetailsOur client is a leading European brand in surface-finishing solutions company. Their company operate over 40 countries globally with 4,000 diverse workforces. They constantly investing in R&D to ensure customers accomplish their goals. They always on hand to provide high quality products and services to our customers. DescriptionAs a Regional Supply Chain Manager, you are responsible forDeveloping a comprehensive supply chain strategy to support current and future requirements of the company, including the management of forecasting processes, procurement, capacity planning, and scheduling, warehousing, freight, and order fulfillmentGiving business directions, resolves problem, prepares schedules in order to ensure timely completion of workEnsure effective and efficient execution through agreed supply planning and logistics ways-of-workingSet constraint through management of allocations to maximize sales while minimizing risk of cutting or substituting customer ordersDrive implementation and management of Allocation Process improvements and stakeholder development within and across the Brands and Commercial Units  ProfileIn order to be considered, you must have:Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain or related fieldsOver 8 years of related experiences in Supply Chain Management, warehouse, customer service and planningKnowledge of chemical products is advantageHand on function in SEA independently (not only monitoring or coordinating)Experienced in managing more than one country is a mustTeam players and "can-do" attitudeGood Attitude and Interpersonal skillGood command in spoken & written English  Job OfferVery attractive salaryChance to work and learn from one of the most leading successful global companyAble to prioritize both your personal and professional development  To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Chavit Sukseree on +662 012 5055

job_responsibilities: ['       PRTR Manufacturing Recruitment Team is supporting a leading international manufacturing company in Lat Krabang, that provides Infrastructure/hardware solutions to the Energy, Telcom, Renewable, Marine + more industries.The company uses a global supply chain network for the design, testing and procurement of its materials – your job is to be involved in this. Position: Logistics Officer 30-50K (USA Trading Company)Based: 30,000-50,000 Baht/ month plus other benefitsContact Recruiter: Kusumant (086-378-4085)Kusumant (at) mriww.co.thOur client is one of the world’s leading agricultural chemical companies. They are expanding aggressively in Thailand and Asia Pacific region. They are now looking for a Logistics Officer.Responsibilities:Coordinate with overseas colleagues and shipping agents for the shipments review the shipping documents especially COA to ensure the timeliness of the import cargoes.Monitor shipment and frequently update ETA shipment advice to ensure the accurate and timely delivery to the Plant.Liaise with the Plant & Warehouse team to plan the delivery container.Review the draft import entry, provide the supporting documents, and approve to the shipping agents. job_title: Supply Chain Unit Manager (Manufacturing and Heavy Industry), Pathumthani, Thailand
job_description: Salary: AttractiveAdditional Benefits: AttractiveCompany ProfileExecutive recruitment company Monroe Consulting Group Thailand is recruiting on behalf of a well-established manufacturing companies in Asia. Our respected client is seeking a technical improvement professional for the job of Supply Chain Unit Manager, who has a vital role in the planning, organizing and carrying out of large-scale projects. The position is based in BangkokJob SummaryA Supply Chain Manager reviews data and then enacts a plan in order to make improvements to the supply chain system for multiple plants. Ideal manager will manage both inbound and outbound logistic, in lining with inventory and warehouse function. He or she will deploy policy and management strategies to each plant for better operations.Job ResponsibilitiesLeads the supply chain team in executing best practices and measuring performance through agreed upon Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).Directs and coordinates global supply chain functions through strategy, resource optimization, profitability maximization, and KPIs resulting in the maximization of customer satisfaction.Plans, manages, and coordinates all activities related to the sourcing and procurement of necessary materials and supplies needed to meet the changing levels of product demand.Works with plant, warehouse, and logistics departments to determine and set up intercompany transfers.Works directly with sales department to determine most cost-effective distribution solution for finished goods transportation to customers.Monitors and corrects inventory levels at outside warehouses (3PL) and internally to ensure rotation and maximize working capital.Works with freight forwards and transportation companies to set best route and rate (reviews and approves all freight terms and agreements).Collaborates with procurement department to determine best practice for freight in and freight consolidation.Supports proper utilization of ERP system.Member of the operations staff, responsible to routinely report on department KPIs along with appropriate analysis and countermeasures where necessary.Job RequirementsBachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain/Logistics, or equivalent experience.Quick learner with the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously, maintain focus, and adapt to a variety of challengesExperience managing and improving supply chain data, information and processesActively seek to improve all aspects of the supply chain by streamlining steps and locating the best prices for inventoryProfessional communication skills are essential when conversing and negotiating with vendorsExceptional ability to conceptualize large-picture projects and foresee challenges and needs to be addressed · Top-level understanding of all aspects of supply chain processesAbility to research companies and determine the best vendors to reach out to for various projectsPrevious experience with Supply Chain Management is essentialSupply Chain Management certification is strongly preferredPossesses strong verbal and written communication skills and the ability to influence at all levels · Builds trustful and effective relationshipsAble to think strategically and translate strategies into actionable plansTakes responsibility, drives results, and achieves expected outcomeINTERESTED? All applications will be treated in the strictest confidence. If you are a suitable match for this positionplease simply click theAPPLYbutton below and please ensurethat your CV is a WORD document and not a PDF.

job_description: Job descriptionWarehouse & Supply Chain Manager:*** "Chinese or English Speaking" ***  1. According to the requirements of enterprise operation and management, formulate and implement warehouse management, warehousing management and other systems.  2. According to the characteristics of the enterprise's warehousing work, prepare various work processes and operation standards and supervise the implementation.  3. Comprehensively carry out warehouse operation management, process and system optimization, reasonably control cost, improve warehousing efficiency, warehousing efficiency and utilization rate, and ensure the achievement rate of warehousing KPI;  4. Be responsible for the assessment, training and training of department staff, the construction of talent echelon, etc., and build an efficient team;  5. Responsible for the safe operation of storage, process monitoring of purchase, sale, stock return and other links, abnormal data monitoring, business process standardization, and reducing inventory differences;  6. Collect and analyze daily operation data of each warehouse, and submit operation analysis report regularly.  7. Be responsible for the communication and coordination between the storage department and other departments.  8. Complete other tasks assigned by superior leaders.Qualifications:  1. College degree or above, major is not limited,management, logistics and other related majors are preferred.  2. At least 3 years working experience in warehouse management related positions,with well-known enterprise working experience is preferred.  3. Proficient in warehouse management, supply chain management and other related professional knowledge, master planning management, logistics,understand the relevant knowledge of financial management.  4. Proficient in warehouse, good communication and coordination ability,with high problem solving ability and analysis and judgment ability.  5. Highly responsible, pragmatic and dedicated.  6. Chinese-Thai bilingual preferred.

job_responsibilities: ["Responsibilities:Ensure the goods safety and inventory accuracy of the company's cooperated projects.Identify high-quality suppliers that meet the company's requirements for cooperation and conduct overall management to ensure that the services provided by the partners are in line with our needs. Aim to achieve the best cost accounting method, accounting, and management of the warehouse logistics costs of each project, replacement, elimination, replacement, etc. of inappropriate suppliers. Receive the goods of each cooperation project on time and regularly to ensure the goods received Consistent with the list of goods.If damaged goods are encountered and consumers return the goods, arrangements must be made within a specified period of time and the corresponding situation should be reported to the company. Regular inventory counts should be organized and corresponding inventory reports and analysis suggestions provided.Provide monthly and annual project reports on time and provide professional opinions and suggestions."]

Supply Chain ManagerSalary: 90 - 120 KB per Month Our Client:Our partner is a global Consumer Electronic Manufacturer Company (Kitchen Solution). job_title: Overseas Trade Operation Officer/พนักงานปฏิบัติการนำเข้าและส่งออก
job_description: รายละเอียดงานประสานงานกับหน่วยงานต่างๆ ทั้งภายในและภายนอก ตลอดจนจัดทำเอกสารที่เกี่ยวข้องและดำเนินการเพื่อการนำเข้าสินค้าของธุรกิจที่ได้รับมอบหมาย ตลอดจนแก้ไขปัญหาเพื่อให้มีการรับสินค้าอย่างถูกต้อง ครบถ้วน รวมถึงประสานงานเมื่อมีความเสียหายของสินค้า จัดทำสรุปสถิติการนำเข้าสินค้า และรายงานสรุปการนำเข้าสินค้าทั้งหมดขององค์กร เพื่อจัดส่งให้ผู้บังคับบัญชาจัดเตรียมเอกสารต่างๆ ให้กับผู้บริหารและภายในหน่วยงานคุณสมบัติอายุ 23-25 ปีขึ้นไป (หากเป็นเพศชายผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหาร)การศึกษา ปริญญาตรี สาขาบริหารธุรกิจ หรือ ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการนำเข้า-ส่งออก, การค้าระหว่างประเทศมีประสบการณ์ 0-2 ปีมีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี, มีทักษะการประสานงานและสื่อสารที่ดีสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ (ฟัง พูด อ่าน เขียน)สถานที่ปฏิบัติงานสำนักงานใหญ่ สุขุมวิท 60 (BTS บางจาก)สวัสดิการประกันสุขภาพกลุ่มการประกันอุบัติเหตุเงินช่วยเหลือ กรณีมรณกรรมของบุคคลในครอบครัวตรวจร่างกายประจำปีกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพโบนัส การันตี 2 เดือน

job_responsibilities: ['Job Responsibilities:Manage all activities related to dispatching, routing, and tracking transportation vehicles (Trailer business).Plan, organize and manage the work of subordinate staff to ensure that the work is accomplished in a manner consistent with organizational requirements.Direct investigations to verify and resolve customer or shipper complaints.Collaborate with other managers and staff members in order to formulate and implement policies, procedures, goals, and objectives.Monitor operations to ensure that staff members comply with administrative policies and procedures, safety rules, and government regulations.Monitor spending to ensure that expenses are consistent with approved budgets..Conduct investigations in cooperation with government agencies to determine causes of transportation accidents and to improve safety procedures.Analyze expenditures and other financial information in order to develop plans, policies, and budgets for increasing profits and improving services.Goal-setting and performance reviews for direct reports; quickly addressing performance issues in a constructive mannerEnsuring all trailers are routed by transportation planner team to maximize on-time and efficient deliveries.']

']

job_title: Transport Manager or GM level (Max to 150K) at Bowin Sriracha, Chonburi
job_responsibilities: ['This position is NOT only manage “Transport/vehicle”, we are looking who have experience and/or knowledge in “Industrial Waste” management industry, to manage/handle the duties as GM level.Responsibilities:(1) GeneralManagement, conduct and supervise for nationwide hazardous/non-hazardous waste transport of companies and other related transport stations.Organize and manage all employees (including subcontractor), vehicles, containers and other equipment of transport department.Collaboration with other managers and staff members in order to formulateand implement policies, procedures, goals, and objectives.(2) QualityManagement of activities related to cost effective dispatching and routing transport vehicles.Monitor operations to ensure that staff members comply with government regulations, administrative policies, corporate standard operation procedures, safety rules and other required standards.Conduct employee training on subjects such as hazardous/non-hazardous waste handling, employee orientation, quality improvement.(3) CostMaking a draft of a yearly budget including capital expenditures for management approval.Monitor spending to ensure that expenses are consistent with approved budgets.Improvement of cost efficiency for better profitability.(4) SafetySet/revise operations policies and standards, including determination of safety operation procedures for the handling of hazardous/non-hazardous waste.Promote safe work activities by carrying out of safety training program, conducting safety audits, attending company safety meetings, and meeting with individual staff members.(5) OthersAny tasks assigned by President (Japanese).']

Have experience and/or knowledge in “Industrial Waste” management industry, to manage/handle the duties as GM level.Knowledge of nationwide hazardous/non-hazardous waste transport will be advantage.Good command of English. Able to work alternative on Saturday (two Saturday per week)Interested candidates please send your application letter with resume, current and expected salary with contact details directly to Manpower.Manpower Thailand – Eastern Seaboard Branch143/165 Moo 12, T.Nong-prue, A.Banglamung Chonburi 20150Tel. 033-135014 ext.3405 or direct line 089-2739854Attn: Ms.Jaru Sritin – Recruitment Consultantjaru.s @manpower.th.com "]
job_description: This position is NOT only manage “Transport/vehicle”, we are looking who have experience and/or knowledge in “Industrial Waste” management industry, to manage/handle the duties as GM level.Responsibilities:(1) GeneralManagement, conduct and supervise for nationwide hazardous/non-hazardous waste transport of companies and other related transport stations.Organize and manage all employees (including subcontractor), vehicles, containers and other equipment of transport department.Collaboration with other managers and staff members in order to formulateand implement policies, procedures, goals, and objectives.(2) QualityManagement of activities related to cost effective dispatching and routing transport vehicles.Monitor operations to ensure that staff members comply with government regulations, administrative policies, corporate standard operation procedures, safety rules and other required standards.Conduct employee training on subjects such as hazardous/non-hazardous waste handling, employee orientation, quality improvement.(3) CostMaking a draft of a yearly budget including capital expenditures for management approval.Monitor spending to ensure that expenses are consistent with approved budgets.Improvement of cost efficiency for better profitability.(4) SafetySet/revise operations policies and standards, including determination of safety operation procedures for the handling of hazardous/non-hazardous waste.Promote safe work activities by carrying out of safety training program, conducting safety audits, attending company safety meetings, and meeting with individual staff members.(5) OthersAny tasks assigned by President (Japanese).Qualification:Male, age above 40 years old. Bachelor's degree of any related field. Have experience and/or knowledge in “Industrial Waste” management industry, to manage/handle the duties as GM level.Knowledge of nationwide hazardous/non-hazardous waste transport will be advantage.Good command of English. Able to work alternative on Saturday (two Saturday per week)Interested candidates please send your application letter with resume, current and expected salary with contact details directly to Manpower.Manpower Thailand – Eastern Seaboard Branch143/165 Moo 12, T.Nong-prue, A.Banglamung Chonburi 20150Tel. 033-135014 ext.3405 or direct line 089-2739854Attn: Ms.Jaru Sritin – Recruitment Consultantjaru.s @manpower.th.com

job_title: Customs & Global Trade Advisory : Senior Consultant - Manager
job_responsibilities: ['Deloitte Thailand is looking to expand our Global Trade Advisory team with a Senior Consultant or Manager.Our Customs & Global Trade Advisory team helps companies navigate the complex maze of customs and trade rules, manage compliance risks and maximize cost and duty savings opportunities associated with the production, transport, import and export of goods around the world.For the new hire we are interested in candidates who have the right academic background and work experience in the field of customs, excise tax and international trade, preferably in the automotive sector.The selected candidate will immediately be seconded to one of our clients located in Rayong on a full time basis for the duration of one year. After one year, the employee will work within Deloitte’s Global Trade Advisory team in Bangkok.Responsibilities:For the on-site secondment, the selected candidate is expected to provide daily operational support to the ongoing customs and excise operations of an automotive manufacturer, including:Tariff classification of new products and HS code monitoring (including updates and conversion)Customs clearance oversight for import and export (including coordination with and review of customs brokers, data management, document retention and day to day direction)Free Zone operations oversight (local inbound, local content submissions)Excise Tax submissionsFTA review, analysis and submission for exportsConsignments/ scrap parts review and reportingAPI inventorySupport with customs/excise tax/local content auditsPrepare monthly reports on import/export value and duty savingsBusiness Risk ManagementImpact analysis of new regulations (customs and other)Obtain license extensions and reportsAttend and facilitate meetings and conference callsAs a Deloitte advisor, the selected candidate is expected to provide customs, trade and excise services (advisory, planning, due diligence, compliance reviews, etc) to multinational clients in a variety of industries:Conduct research and analysis of a wide range of customs, trade and excise issues related to business transactions in Thailand under international (WTO/WCO), regional (ASEAN) and Thai regulations to advise multinational companies on global import and export strategies and compliance requirementsSupport Clients with the development and execution of duty/ excise tax minimization and supply chain optimization strategies by utilizing Free Trade Agreements, customs privilege schemes and transaction restructuring Support Clients in managing the risks of international trade from a customs compliance perspective, with a specific focus on valuation, customs classification, import and export controls and dealing with customs authorities Provide assistance to Partner, Director and Manager in handling client portfolios and assignments, as well as the preparation of workshops, seminars and conferencesEngage in cross-border projects as part of an integrated Customs & Global Trade network in the APAC region to deliver multinational clients tailor made solutions']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor or Master’s Degree in Law, Taxation or another business related field3 - 9 years of working experience in providing customs, international trade, excise and/or other related tax/legal servicesExcellent verbal and written communication skills, with a strong command of EnglishDemonstrate interest in international trade or international businessCreative thinker; a thirst for knowledge; good reasoning, processing and analytical skills; efficient multi-taskingProject management skills, confident, with a strong business senseAble to manage works under pressureProficiency in the use of Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint ']

job_description: Job Descriptions:Documenting details of trading that is L/C TERM.Liaising with various internal and external related agencies; such as boat companies, shipping companies, transportation companies and the excise department to achieve the goal.Checking the cost of each shipment sent.Completing the export process and providing timely according to customers' requirements.Preparing documents related to the export of internal and external goods.Following up on documents related to exports from the shipping company and requesting for a refund of 19 BIS.Communicating with customers during the export process until delivering the shipping documents to customers.Qualifications:Bachelor's Degree in Logistics or any related field.Male or Female / Thai Nationality / not over 25-30 years old.A minimum of 1-2 years of experience in shipping.Knowledgeable of Customs Law, EDI, C/O.Strong interpersonal skill, good coordination and service mind.Highly responsible and willing to learn.Able to work at Nong Kham Si Racha Chon Buri by own transportation.REFERENCE CODE: SHIPO1291205

Position OverviewWe’re looking for a sr. manager, who leads a team of business process PM and digitalization specialists in the field of Opportunity to Cash and neighboring processes. The team initiates and manages process improvements and digital solution initiatives using the latest technologies, i.e. artificial intelligence, robotic process automation, business process management solutions.Reporting to Regional Head of Business Process Management, you will set the direction and take the lead in process improvement project from identifying the value stream until implementation with the aim to increase efficiency and reduce cost. To succeed in the job, you will need to have initiative spirit, able to work independently, have great leadership and communication skill.Key ResponsibilitiesThe scope of the role is regional and spans across all functions include finance/accounting, Supply Chain, Customer Services, IT, and Process AutomationLead delivery of automation initiatives for Opportunity-to-Cash, Supply Chain, Store Operations, Marketing; manage program deliverables while maintaining adherence to governance and change management processAssess the opportunities to add efficiency and the budget required and ROI of various solutions.Plan and manage the project to ensure the deliverable is achieved by target timeline and within the budgetDrive innovation and evaluate new tools/application. Review areas for improvement and make appropriate recommendations including business process change, system configuration change,Ensuring upstream and downstream processes and impacts are addressed Document current processes, identify opportunities for simplification and standardizationLead end-to-end business process review meetings and workshops Manage workflow release management and operation support Desired Skills and ExperienceBachelor's or Master’s degree in a relevant area; e-commerce, Process Improvement, Finance/Accounting or Business process engineeringAt least 7 years of experience in one of the above-mentioned fields, with specific experience of implementing business processes and systems across multiple departments and with a track record to deliver projectsAbility to project manage key projects with tight deadlines Force the pace of decision-making with imperfect information Ability to establish and maintain strong relationships with project stakeholders including senior managementPrevious experience with BPM/BPI workflow or software Understanding of accounting process flow, including AR/AP GL is highly advantageousCapability to effectively manage deadlines/time, prioritization, in a fast-paced environmentAbility to self-direct and accomplish objectives as part of larger project teams.BEING PART OF THE BUSINESS PROCESS MANAGEMENT TEAMThe Regional Business Process Team is responsible for the Core business process functions of aCommerce responsible for improving andsetting up process governance and serving users across Business Units.Being part of our team means that you will be trusted to deliver. You are expected to work independently and under minimal supervision.But of course, teamwork is a must! Being part of the Regional Business Process Team requires leadership, collaboration, and accountabilitywith the other business units to ensure that the business process initiatives, compliance, governance, improvements and systems arerunning smoothly, efficiently and effectively.Creativity is a plus as we do not want to limit ourselves with thinking within the box!Lastly, we are a team of diverse individuals of different professional backgrounds – we respect one another regardless of our genderpreferences, nationalities, beliefs, religions and associations. We embrace diversity and inclusion.

รายละเอียดการทำงานตรวจสอบยอดสต็อคคงเหลือตรวจเช็ครายการสินค้าเข้า / วัน / เดือน QAจัดทำเอกสารใบโยกสินค้าระหว่างคลังจัดทำเอกสารใบเปลี่ยนสินค้าจัดทำข้อมูลเกี่ยวรับสต็อกทั้งหมดสามารถเดินทางตรวจสต็อกสินค้าที่โรงงานได้คุณสมบัติเพศชายอายุ 25 – 35 ปีวุฒิการศึกษา ปริญญาตรีมีประสบการณ์การทำงานคลังสินค้า 1-2 ปีมีความรู้ด้านภาษาอังกฤษ เบื้องต้นคุณสมบัตอื่นๆ ขยัน ตั้งใจ อดทน ซื่อสัตย์มีความละเอียดรอบคอบมีความกระตือรือร้นในการทำงานรับแรงกดดันจากการทำงานได้ดี

job_title: Sales Administration Segment Chief (Import-Export)/หัวหน้าส่วนบริหารงานขาย (นำเข้า-ส่งออก)
job_description: Job detailSet work goals for use in operations in the department to achieve the KPI. Coordinate and have knowledge in import-export of goods in various formats. Have an understanding of customs procedures and control the BOI-promoted projects.Review the documents used in import-export. Coordinate shipments in the form of customs clearance for export and import duty free zones.Take care of the terms and after sales from customers, such as receiving complaints and fixing the requirements in various standards.Send delivery schedule and track the delivery status of products to customers.Coordinate with both internal and external agencies. To deliver products that meet the needs of customers and deliver products correctly on time.Procure, compare, inspect and evaluate shipping agents and control the delivery cost in various ways.Study, follow up the situation of current changes in order to adapt to work and bringing new working styles that are modern to adapt to work for efficiency.Perform other works as assigned. Applicant qualificationMale / Female 35 years old and older Bachelor's degree in International Management or related fields Have knowledge and experience in import-export ceremony , International trade privileges 5 years or more.Able to communicate in English, speaking, reading and writing well. Have communication skills, coordination and have skills in using office equipment.Leadership, originality, creativity, witty, honest, thorough and able to work under pressure.Have knowledge of quality system ISO / HACCP / GMP. Experience in food factory will be an advantage.

Business Development Executive plays a critical role in growth of SKOOTAR by leading the business development, B2B client project management and B2B client relationship management. Be a part of Potato Corner, one of the fastest growing F&B companies in Thailand! We are a young and lean organization that focuses on delivering efficiency and performance with minimal bureaucracy. Our goal is very simple, to be the Number One Snack Brand in Thailand and most importantly, to have a lot of fun while working towards it!Roles and ResponsibilitiesYou'll be responsible for all supply requrements for Potato Corner ThailandYou'll ensure all items supply and required for operation and other needs are OTIF (on time in full) with right quality.Job Functions:Supply Chain Strategy & OptimizationDeploy Team Excellence : staff management, development, store crew trainingEnable Supply Chain KPIResource Planning Management (people, system, store storage & warehouse, transport)Supply Chain ImprovementsSupply Chain Operation SupervisorSupervise Team to Remove All BacklogManages and controls purchasing expenditures by reviewing PO and/ or Transportation ChargeEnsure Product Quality throughout Supply ChainDemand PlanningOversee, develop and execute Demand Planning RequirementAt least 4 years in SCM from FMCG, F&B industry would be valuedExperience in supply chain strategy, demand planning, warehouse management and process improvementFluent in EnglishExcellent interpersonal and communications skillsSelf-starter, highly organized, team leaderComputer Literacy : Advanced ExcelWe're one of the fastest growing companies in Thailand and we're looking for great people to join us on this journey. If you think you have what it takes, apply!

job_title: Head of Corporate Secretary/ผู้บริหารสำนักกรรมการผู้จัดการ
job_description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ1. กำหนดนโยบาย กลยุทธ์ เป้าหมาย และแผนการดำเนินงานด้านการกำกับดูแลกิจการที่ดีอย่างเป็นรูปธรรม2. กำกับดูแลการดำเนินงาน ส่งเสริมและเผยแพร่วัฒนธรรมการกำกับดูแลกิจการที่ดี และผลักดันให้ผู้บริหาร พนักงาน ลูกจ้าง และผู้มีส่วนได้เสียที่เกี่ยวข้องมีส่วนร่วมในกิจกรรมการกำกับดูแลกิจการที่ดี และติดตามการดำเนินงานด้านการกำกับดูแลกิจการที่ดีให้เป็นไปตามนโยบายและเป้าหมายที่กำหนด3. กำกับดูแล ให้คำปรึกษาแนะนำ และเสนอแนะมาตรการหรือแนวทางที่จำเป็นเพื่อส่งเสริมการดำเนินงานของธนาคารด้านการกำกับดูแลกิจการที่ดี4. กำกับดูแลและบูรณาการกระบวนการทำงานเกี่ยวกับการกำกับดูแลกิจการ (Governance) การบริหารความเสี่ยง (Risk Management) และการปฏิบัติตามข้อกำหนดของกฎหมาย ระเบียบ ข้อบังคับ ประกาศ และหลักเกณฑ์ (Compliance) เพื่อให้บรรลุถึงผลการดำเนินงานที่เกิดจากการมีส่วนร่วมของทุกหน่วยงาน (Integrity-Driven Performance)5. กำกับดูแลและบริหารจัดการประชุมคณะกรรมการธนาคาร คณะกรรมการบริหาร กรรมการอิสระ คณะจัดการและผู้บริหารฝ่าย6. กำกับดูแลการจัดประชุมคณะกรรมการพิจารณาสินเชื่อ (CC) การเตรียมวาระและเอกสารประกอบ ความครบถ้วนของเอกสารขออนุมัติ รวมถึงรายงานผลการประชุม และดำเนินการแจ้งผลการอนุมัติสินเชื่อและประกันให้แก่หน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องภายในองค์กร7. กำกับดูแลและบริหารจัดการเลขานุการผู้บริหารระดับสูงให้มีประสิทธิภาพ กำหนดแนวทางการประสานงานและสนับสนุนการปฎิบัติงานของกรรมการธนาคาร กรรมการผู้จัดการ ผู้บริหารและฝ่ายงานที่เกี่ยวข้องให้เป็นไปตามนโยบาย กฎระเบียบของธนาคารและสอดคล้องกับกฎหมายและแผนงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง8. กำหนดแนวทางการจัดทำงบประมาณประจำปี ของสำนักกรรมการผู้จัดการ และของคณะกรรมการธนาคาร ให้สอดคล้องกับนโยบายและแผนงานอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ9. กำกับ ดูแลและให้คำปรึกษาในการปฎิบัติงาน ติดตามความคืบหน้าและประเมินผลการปฎิบัติงานของ ผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาเพื่อให้การดำเนินงานเป็นไปตามแผนงานและเป้าหมายที่กำหนด ตลอดจนสนับสนุนให้ผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชามีการพัฒนาตนเองและมีทัศนคติที่ดีต่อองค์กรคุณสมบัติ1. มีประสบการณ์ในด้านการบริหารจัดการงานเลขานุการอย่างน้อย 12 ปี 2. มีประสบการณ์หรือมีความเข้าใจในงานด้านการกำกับดูแลกิจการที่ดี3. มีประสบการณ์ในการช่วยบริหารจัดการฝ่ายงานอย่างน้อย 3 ปี4. มีความรู้ความเข้าใจด้านการกำกับดูแลกิจการที่ดีภายใต้กรอบการดำเนินงานของรัฐวิสาหกิจ5. มีความรู้ความเข้าใจในขั้นตอน กระบวนการทำงานของธนาคาร6. มีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับผลิตภัณฑ์และการบริการของธนาคาร7. มีความสามารถในการสื่อข้อความทั้งด้านการพูดและการเขียน ภาษาไทยและภาษาอังกฤษ

job_responsibilities: [' Objectives of this RoleContributing to the creative concepts by providing innovative ideas that can be executed.Bringing a strategic approach to crafting cohesive, multi-channel creative concepts.Staying up to date with design and advertising industry trends.Taking ownership of the visual elements of creative work.Having a strong knowledge of typography, image manipulation, illustration, and animation.Having a broad understanding of marketing design and layout will also be expected.Confidently explaining and supporting ideas, both internally and externally.Having a keen eye for visual details and accuracy.Being resilient to perform under pressure and deliver high-quality works to tight deadlines.Having a high level of IT skills in the latest art and design packages.Being well aware of the creative trends, digital media and evolving all design platforms.ResponsibilitiesSupervising a cross-functional team of art directors, graphic designers, copywriters, photographers/videographers, and project managers in the strategic development of messages and deliverables.Prioritizing work and resources across engagements based on short- and long-term needs, establishing production schedules by collaborating with designers, copywriters, and production departments.Conducting brainstorming sessions with the team, maintaining strategic and creative thinking to develop innovative and actionable creative initiatives in a fiscally responsible manner.Meeting deadlines while managing multiple projects simultaneously.Ensuring high standards for visual creative output while reporting to the Creative Director.Translating key insights and learnings into effective design concepts, campaigns, and presentations.Having a flexible approach and willingness to adapt ideas to the needs of clients.']

job_responsibilities: ['Responsibilitiesบันทึกบัญชีเจ้าหนี้และเอกสารทำจ่าย สำหรับค่าใช้จ่ายด้านการตลาด, ค่าใช้จ่ายด้านค่าออกอากาศ และ ค่าใช้จ่ายต่าง ๆ ของบริษัท (Non-trade) รวมถึงการตั้งค่าใช้จ่ายค้างจ่ายประจำเดือนบันทึกบัญชี การตั้งเงินสดย่อย เงินสำรองจ่าย และ ติดตามการเคลียร์ยอดค่าใช้จ่าย รวมถึง การเบิกจ่ายของพนักงานบริษัท (Petty cash, Cash advance & employee expensed clearance)สร้างรหัสเจ้าหนี้ ใน SAP ตรวจสอบสัญญาการซื้อขาย และส่งยืนยันยอดระหว่างบัญชีเจ้าหนี้การค้า รวมถึงการควบคุมเอกสารสัญญาการจำหน่ายบันทึกบัญชีเจ้าหนี้ ทั้ง consignment รายงานสินค้าคงเหลือ ตรวจสอบเอกสารการวางบิล รวมถึงสรุปยอดทำจ่ายประจำเดิอนการจัดทำรายงานและการยื่นแบบภาษี ภ.ง.ด 3,53,54 และ PP.30, 36 รายงานภาษีซื้อ-ขาย รวมถึงการขอหนังสือรับรองใบหักภาษี ณ ที่จ่าย 54 (ร.อ.01) ให้กับเจ้าหนี้ต่างประเทศ และ และกระทบยอดตัวเลขในบัญชีงบทดลองการบันทึกบัญชี Fixed Assets และการตรวจนับประจำปี จัดเตรียมเอกสารให้ผู้ตรวจสอบบัญชีงานอื่นๆที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บังคับบัญชา']
job_qualifications: ['sKnowledge in tax, accounting principles (GAAP), Internal Control system, Journal Voucher for adjustmentGood analytical skills, proactive, accurate and detail - orientedGood computer skill including MS Office applications , SAPสวัสดิการกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพบริษัทสมทบให้ 3-7 %กองทุนเงินทดแทนประกันสังคมประกันสุขภาพประกันอุบัติเหตุกรณีเสียชีวิตเงินช่วยเหลือกรณีสมรส/ คลอดบุตร / มรณกรรม / ภัยพิบัติกระเช้าเยี่ยมไข้การโบนัสประจำปีตามผลประกอบการบริษัทปรับเงินเดือนประจำปีตามผลการปฏิบัติงานของแต่ละบุคคลห้องพยาบาล, สถานที่ออกกำลังกายงานเลี้ยงประจำปีอย่างน้อยปีละ 1 ครั้งส่วนลด50% สำหรับการใช้สินค้า/บริการในกลุ่มทรู (ค่าบริการโทรศัพท์ , อินเตอร์เน็ต ,เคเบิ้ล ) และส่วนลดค่าเครื่อง ตามเงื่อนไขของบริษัทซื้อสินค้าในช่องTrue Shopping รับส่วนลด 10-50% ตามเงื่อนไขของบริษัทสวัสดิการเงินกู้ธนาคารอาคารสงเคราะห์/ ออมสิน / ไทยพาณิชย์ / อิสลามทุนการศึกษาพนักงานและบุตรพนักงานตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี     สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน:อาคารทรู ทาวเวอร์ 2 ถนนพัฒนาการ แขวงสวนหลวง เขตสวนหลวง กรุงเทพฯ                           โทรศัพท์ :02-780-7054                            โทรสาร :02-780-7008                     https://WWW.TRUE-SHOPPING.COM ']

We are looking for a responsible Senior Executive Assistant to support our senior managers in a timely and professional manner. You will provide high-quality administrative and clerical assistance to top-level executives. The Senior Executive Assistant’s main duties include scheduling meetings, making travel arrangements and organizing daily calendars. To be successful in this role, you should be proactive, meet deadlines and communicate effectively.ResponsibilitiesCoordinate daily calendars of senior managersPlan appointments and eventsAct as the point of contact between executives and employees/clientsCreate regular reports and update internal databasesMake travel arrangementsManage phone calls and emailsRespond promptly to managers’ queriesFacilitate internal communication (e.g. distribute information and schedule presentations)Suggest more efficient ways to run the office and troubleshoot malfunctionsReview and recommend changes to our company policiesRequirementsProven work experience as a Senior Executive Assistant,Executive Administrative Assistantor similar role Knowledge of office proceduresSolid experience with office management systems and MS OfficeFamiliarity with online calendars and cloud systemsExcellent in EnglishStrong communication skills (via phone, email and in-person)Experience exercising discretion and confidentiality with sensitive company informationExcellent organizational skills with an ability to think proactively and prioritize workBachelor’s degree or higher; additional qualifications as Personal Assistant or Secretary are a plusIf you would like to apply for this position, please send your CV by click " Apply Now"
